entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Test plan for "collection literals" #66418
    C# 12.0
  • Can't run "Declare Public Members" codefix provider for newly added Syntax types. #66414
    17.5
  • Unusable Blazor analyzers blinking invalid RZ10012 Warnings in Visual Studio VS 17.4.4 (see video) #66413
  • High CPU Utilization with Very Basic Keypresses #66410
    17.6
  • Compiler reports error CS0618 'member' is obsolete even when the containing member is obsolete itself #66409
  • Test failed in CI: Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Editor.CSharp.UnitTests.AddUsing.AddUsingTests.TestSimpleUnsortedUsings1(testHost: OutOfProcess) #66408

Closed

  • Bug: Using foreach, it's possible to accidentally mutate a ref readonly without any unsafe code #66135
    17.6
  • DocumentationCommentCompiler.GetDescription fails on net7.0 #65951
  • [C#] Stack Overflow when a method pointer type appears in an attribute #65594
    17.6

PullRequests

Created

  • Catch exceptions when doing I/O to read the generator file version #66422
    Area-IDE
  • Fix mismatched per-language option storages #66421
    Area-IDE
  • Fix DateTime item's description in different culture #66420
    Area-IDE
  • Initial support for collection literal parsing. #66417
    Area-Compilers
  • Ensure no extension method applies to System.Void #66416
    Area-Compilers
  • Initial syntax types for collection literals #66412
    Area-Compilers
  • Nullable annotations for DebugInfoInjector, DynamicAnalysisInjector #66411
    Area-Compilers
  • Take incremental nullability snapshot for local functions #66406
    Area-Compilers
  • Visit unreachable `when` clauses by `NullableWalker` #66405
  • Merge release/dev17.5-vs-deps to main #66404
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Introduce Parameter - Fix crash #66402
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Emit defensive copy for constrained call on `in` parameter #66189
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Improve our testing of DefaultAnalyzerAssemblyLoader #66356
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Update Language Feature Status.md #66415
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Add entry for RazorCompiler #66393
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Revert "Do not copy nullable value type receiver of a constrained call." #66407
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Report double storage warning for primary constructor parameters #66392
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Primary Constructors
  • Move constants to RefSafetyAnalysis visitor #66097
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Block `delegate*<void>...enum` constants in attributes #66073
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.5 to release/dev17.5-vs-deps #66403
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Handle compiler diagnostics reported in .cshtml files during build #66355
    Area-IDE, Needs Shiproom Approval, area-web-frameworks
  • Fix reading VB editor options from ISettingsManager (17.5) #66396
    Area-IDE, OnDeckForQB, OnDeckForServicing
  • 17.5: Fix issue where Solution-Explorer symbol nodes collapse after a… #66400
    Area-IDE, OnDeckForQB
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2087177 #66401

Updated

  • Allow specifying expected IL verification baseline #66316
    Area-Compilers
  • Emit copy when calling non-readonly method with ref readonly field receiver #66351
    Area-Compilers
  • Adding keyword recommendations after FileKeyword #66357
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Different behaviour of discard expression #66309
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.6
  • Allow multiple documents in method debug info #66359
    Area-Interactive, Pending director approval
  • Apply diagnostic filter to generator failure warnings #66263
    Area-Compilers, 17.6
  • Fix line breaks between members when a property has an initializer #65924
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Ensure event handler generation and navigation in webforms works properly #66394
    Area-IDE
  • Let LSP client know which diagnostics are build-only. #66329
    Area-IDE
  • Solution services cleanup #64160
    Area-IDE
  • Add test showing incorrect sequence point placement #66363
    Area-Compilers, Test
  • Treat `TypedReference` as managed #66328
    Area-Compilers, 17.6
  • Visit query lambda by `NullableWalker` even without conversion #66384
    Area-Compilers
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2087588 #66287
